newsitem.title: USA: Katz Digital Q3 pro forma $0.02 vs $0.09.
newsitem.headline: Katz Digital Q3 pro forma $0.02 vs $0.09.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTES: Pro forma net earnings relect a provision for additional Federal and State taxes that the company was not previously subject to, and for the nine months ended Sept 30, 1996 also excludes the $723,000 nonrecurring charge relating to the termination of Subchapter S status.
Full company name is Katz Digital Technologies Inc.
